alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Union; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 1:24PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN BRADFORD... SOUTHEASTERN BAKER...NORTHEASTERN UNION...NORTHWESTERN CLAY AND WESTERN DUVAL COUNTIES THROUGH 200 PM EDT... At 124 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Raiford, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Starke, Raiford, Middleburg, Maxville, Kingsley, Camp Blanding, Lawtey, and Ellerbee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Bradford; Union; Western Clay; Western Duval
